critical_information.title: FOOLPROOF FORMAT - No More Count Mismatches
critical_information.description: Locations and labels are BOUND TOGETHER using ~ (tilde) separator within a single parameter. This architecture makes it IMPOSSIBLE to create count mismatch errors.
critical_information.key_rule: Every location MUST be paired with its label using ~ before adding it to the URL
critical_information.format: Location~Label (bound together, then separate pairs with |)

breaking_changes.change: NEW PARAMETER FORMAT: Locations and labels combined in single parameters using ~ separator
breaking_changes.backward_compatibility: Old parameters still work but display deprecation warning in console

chronoLocationsAndLabels.description: Combined parameter for chronological locations (blue markers, connected with walking paths). Each location is BOUND to its label using ~ separator.
chronoLocationsAndLabels.mandatory_structure: Each entry MUST have format: Location~Label

separators.location_to_label: ~ (tilde) - BINDS each location to its metadata (MANDATORY)
separators.blank_line_in_label: %0A%0A - creates blank line within label text

label_format_5_line.line_1: Location name only (becomes marker label and popup title)
label_format_5_line.line_2: Historical context in format: 'YEAR AD: AncientName, AncientRegion'
label_format_5_line.line_3: Modern context in format: 'YEAR AD: ModernName, ModernCountry'
label_format_5_line.line_5_plus: Detailed historical description (can span multiple lines)

chronoLocationsAndLabels.example_rich: Antioch,Turkey~Antioch%0A47-48 AD: Antioch, Syria%0A2025 AD: Antakya, Turkey%0A%0AAntioch served as Paul's primary mission base.|Rome,Italy~Rome%0A60-62 AD: Rome, Roman Empire%0A2025 AD: Rome, Italy%0A%0APaul was held under house arrest in Rome.

referenceLocationsAndLabels.description: Combined parameter for reference locations (red markers, standalone, not connected). Each location is BOUND to its label using ~ separator.
referenceLocationsAndLabels.mandatory_structure: Each entry MUST have format: Location~Label
referenceLocationsAndLabels.separators: Same as chronological locations (~ binds location to label, | separates pairs)
referenceLocationsAndLabels.label_format: Same 5-line structure recommended as chronological locations
referenceLocationsAndLabels.example: Jerusalem,Israel~Jerusalem%0A33 AD: Jerusalem, Judea%0A2025 AD: Jerusalem, Israel%0A%0AThe Church's birthplace and site of Pentecost.

step_1.title: List your locations
step_1.description: Write out each location in 'City, Country' format

step_2.title: Create label for EACH location
step_2.description: CRITICAL: You must create a label for every single location using 5-line format
example_labels: Damascus%0A32 AD: Damascus, Syria%0A2025 AD: Damascus, Syria%0A%0AConversion of Saul
Antioch%0A47 AD: Antioch, Syria%0A2025 AD: Antakya, Turkey%0A%0AMission base
Philippi%0A50 AD: Philippi, Macedonia%0A2025 AD: Filippoi, Greece%0A%0AFirst European church
Rome%0A62 AD: Rome, Roman Empire%0A2025 AD: Rome, Italy%0A%0AHouse arrest ministry

step_3.title: Bind each location to its label with ~
step_3.description: MANDATORY: Connect each location to its label using tilde separator
example_bindings: Damascus,Syria~Damascus%0A32 AD: Damascus, Syria%0A2025 AD: Damascus, Syria%0A%0AConversion of Saul
Antioch,Turkey~Antioch%0A47 AD: Antioch, Syria%0A2025 AD: Antakya, Turkey%0A%0AMission base
Philippi,Greece~Philippi%0A50 AD: Philippi, Macedonia%0A2025 AD: Filippoi, Greece%0A%0AFirst European church
Rome,Italy~Rome%0A62 AD: Rome, Roman Empire%0A2025 AD: Rome, Italy%0A%0AHouse arrest ministry

step_4.title: Join pairs with | (pipe)
step_4.description: Connect all location~label pairs using pipe character

step_5.title: Add parameter name and build final URL
step_5.description: Prepend parameter name and base URL

error_1.title: Using separate arrays (old deprecated format)
error_1.problem: 4 locations but only 3 labels = count mismatch error
error_1.correct_approach: Use new format with ~ to bind each location to its label

error_2.title: Missing ~ separator
error_2.problem: No labels provided, only locations listed
error_2.correct_approach: MUST bind each location to label: Damascus,Syria~Damascus|Antioch,Turkey~Antioch

error_3.title: Wrong separator character
error_3.correct_approach: Must use ~ to bind location to label

error_4.title: Actual line breaks instead of %0A
error_4.problem: Using real newline characters in URL instead of encoded %0A
error_4.correct_approach: Always use %0A for newlines, %0A%0A for blank lines

pre_construction_validation_checklist: Every location is in 'City, Country' format (e.g., 'Rome, Italy' not 'Rome')
Every location has a corresponding label created
Each location~label pair uses ~ (tilde) to bind them together
Labels use %0A for newlines, not actual line breaks

encoding_reference.tilde: ~ - Use as-is (CRITICAL separator that binds location to label)
encoding_reference.space: %20 - Space character (usually automatic in URL encoding)

placeholder_handling.when_incomplete_data: Use 'Location~TBD' to explicitly mark incomplete data
placeholder_handling.tbd_behavior: Map displays prominent 'TBD' warning in popup to alert user
placeholder_handling.tbd_message_displayed: TBD / TBD: Location information not provided / 2025 AD: Unknown / Please provide complete location details.

final_validation_before_providing_url: Every ~ has a location on left side and label on right side
All location~label pairs are separated by |
Labels use %0A for line breaks (not actual newlines)
URL is under 8000 characters for compatibility

overlays: Walking Paths - Routes connecting chronological locations
Travel Time - Ancient travel time estimates
interactions: Click/tap markers for detailed popups (drawer on mobile, popup on desktop)
Mobile: Swipe down or tap backdrop to close drawer
Desktop: Traditional popup with click interaction

responsive_design.mobile_ui: Bottom drawer slides up on marker tap, swipe gestures supported
responsive_design.instructions_link: Top-right on desktop, bottom-right '?' icon on mobile

tips: CRITICAL: Always use ~ (tilde) to bind each location to its label
MANDATORY: Every location must have a label bound to it with ~
Count mismatches are IMPOSSIBLE with this format (location and label bound together)
Always specify country/region with city names (e.g., 'Rome, Italy' not 'Rome')
Use rich 5-line label format for professional, information-rich popups
First line of each label becomes the marker name displayed on map
Lines 2-3 appear in gray as historical/modern context
Line 5+ becomes the main description text in popup
Use %0A for line breaks, %0A%0A for blank lines between sections
Chronological locations are connected by walking paths in the order specified
Reference locations are standalone and never connected to anything
Keep URLs under 8000 characters for maximum compatibility
Test your URL structure before providing to ensure all ~ separators are present

when_providing_urls_to_users: Provide complete working URL that starts with https://mitchell360.com/map-maker/?
Include brief description (e.g., 'This map shows Paul's second missionary journey with 6 locations')
Note any optional features (e.g., 'Toggle Walking Paths overlay to see routes between locations')
Mention mobile-friendly design if relevant to user's context

deprecated_format.status: Still supported but deprecated as of 2025-10-28
deprecated_format.warning: Browser console displays deprecation warning when old format detected
deprecated_format.why_deprecated: Separate arrays cause count mismatch errors that are impossible to debug
deprecated_format.migration_path: Use new chronoLocationsAndLabels format where location and label are bound with ~

error_handling: Invalid locations skipped (geocoding failure logged to console)
Missing labels after ~ default to location name
TBD labels display prominent placeholder warning
Count mismatches IMPOSSIBLE with new format (fundamental architecture improvement)
